price: ߓߊ߰ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߢߊ߬ߙߊ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߲ ߧߴߊ߬ ߘߐߞߐ߬ߣߐ߲߬ ߛߊ߬ߦߊ ߟߊ߫ ߓߌ߬ߟߊ߬ߒߘߐ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
